author: "Alan T. Arnholt"
date: "1/13/2018"

---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

* Point your browser to [https://github.com/STAT-ATA-ASU](https://github.com/STAT-ATA-ASU)

* Find your repository

* Click the "Clone or download" button

* Clone with https - copy the address to the clipboard

* Open the RStudio IDE

* Click the New Project icon

* Select New Project > Version Control > Git


`r knitr::include_graphics("./images/Cloning.gif")`
